reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty looking, with one noting its high-end print, and appreciate its comfortable stretch cuffs at the wrist. The material is praised for being pleasant to the body, and customers like its periwinkle blue and black color options. Customers describe the dress as flattering, with one highlighting its pleated A-line silhouette, and they find it well-made and true to size. However, opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others note it's not suitable for larger busts. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT DRESS
items.body: I bought this dress for a wedding I attended just before Christmas. I loved the bright, beautiful, vibrant blue of the dress! The cut was flattering and modest. I got so many compliments! I am 5 ft 7 1/2 inches, 36 D, and weigh 155 lbs. This dress was perfect. I wore it again to church the next day and got even more compliments. I can't wait to wear it again. It was worth every penny. The dress is a lighter, breathable fabric. It was great for dancing in and moving around, but when I was out side, I wore a coat because it is December and the weather was in the lower 40s. Read more
items.author: bk32002

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and comfortable to wear!
items.body: Fit was true to size, stretchy elastic and comfy. Material is nice and flowy, good quality! Wore this for Mother’s Day. Read more
items.author: Angela Hitch

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice periwinkle blue dress
items.body: Pretty looking dress, fits well, sleeves are a bit long, but the fabric is such that you can feel quite hot while wearing it. It’s like a georgette but thick, not lightweight. Great for party wear Read more
items.author: Carron

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, comfortable and flattering fit!
items.body: Really pretty and classy little black dress. Ordered for a choir concert at church. Super comfortable, very flattering to my figure. Received lots of compliments. For reference - I am 125lbs, 5’2. Wish I would have gotten a pic from of the whole dress. Read more
items.author: Natalie Wright

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I get compliments!
items.body: I get compliments every time I wear this dress! It maintains it shape and beauty after washing at home. I love the dress! I am 5’4 and 126 lbs. A small fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Tina T.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin material, not as cute as picture
items.body: Undecided on this dress if I will return or not. First, the dress is very 1970's. Like Little House on the Prairie. I got it for church, I wanted something modest and there aren't many nice dress shops anymore. The fabric is not great, it's very thin, it comes in a suction pack and appears very cheap. A slip is 100% required. It's very long. It does look attractive on, it does make my waist look small, but at the same time, for someone as short as I am, the length of the skirt is a couple of inches longer than I expected so it takes over my whole self. Someone in the comments romantically described this as the perfect dress for New England. Well, I'm in New England and it's fall, and this dress is way too thin for fall without a wool undershirt, wool leggings, and a coat over it, so I don't know if they are in California and just dreaming or what. The fabric is a weird oily synthetic. Who knows. No fabric is good anymore. I'm 5'3", 118 lbs and got a medium. That's the correct size. Everything on here is in Asian sizes, measure yourself and look at the size chart. I also got a wide elastic belt with a front clasp because who wants to look at a dress with a plain elasticized waist, and that did help. I think they should have included a matching fabric tie belt, but no luck. Read more
items.author: Sirena

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
items.author: JaVonna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight and comfortable but sheer!
items.body: This is a beautiful lightweight fall dress which i received many compliments on. The fit and cuts are great especially for ones with long torso body types. The length is perfect and came above the ankles for my height of 5'3". Wash on delicate and hang to dry to prevent it getting ruined. The instructions say no dryer, but I did throw it in on low for a short period so I could wear it right away and it didn't shrink. You do need to steam out the wrinkles on upper body and arms sections regardless which only took a few minutes. I didn't give it 5 stars because it is sheer where you can see through it especially in the light, so I wore a slip. Also the stitching quality isn't great. I got it on sale for 30 which was worth the price. But I wouldn't purchase at full price for the quality received. Read more
items.author: jca-ny

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot Brown Floral, Brown Leaves, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Brick Red, Rose Red, Rose Pink, Dark Coffee, Blue, Blue Leaves, Light Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
